plants.germinationNeeds: Direct sow seeds in spring, summer, autumn, or winter in mild climates. Fast-growing, matures in 3-4 weeks.
plants.optimalConditions: Full sun to partial shade. Prefers cool, moist soil but is highly adaptable. Best to sow in succession for a continuous harvest year-round.

plants.germinationNeeds: Sow seeds directly in the garden in spring, summer, or autumn for harvests through winter. Tolerates frost well.
plants.optimalConditions: Full sun to partial shade. Fertile, well-drained soil. Flavor improves after a light frost. A true multi-season plant.

plants.germinationNeeds: Sow from spring through late summer. Can be overwintered in mild climates. Soak seeds before planting to aid germination.
plants.optimalConditions: Full sun to light shade. Tolerant of both heat and cold. Rich, moisture-retentive soil. Can be harvested continuously through all seasons.

plants.germinationNeeds: Sow seeds from early spring to late autumn. Can be grown year-round in many climates. Perennial.
plants.optimalConditions: Full sun. Fertile, well-drained soil. Very cold-hardy. Will multiply into clumps. Can be harvested in any season.
